question: who is the most played artist on spotify
vanilla_rag_result: Based on the passages provided, Drake is the most streamed artist on Spotify for multiple years: he was the most streamed artist in 2015 (1.8 billion streams), 2016 (4.7 billion streams), and 2018 (8.2 billion streams). Therefore, Drake can be considered the most played artist on Spotify during those years.
